name: Picker Summary
query:
select b.picker as "Picker::200",b.total_sales_order as "Sales Order::150",case(b.hour_length div 24) when 0 then concat(convert(mod(b.hour_length,24)+(b.minute_length div 60),char),'h',' ',convert(mod(b.minute_length,60),char),'m')
 else concat(convert(b.hour_length div 24,char),'d',' ',convert(mod(b.hour_length,24)+(b.minute_length div 60),char),'h',' ',convert(mod(b.minute_length,60),char),'m') end as "Completion Duration::250",
 b.quantity as "Quantity:Float:150"
 from (
select a.picker, count(a.sales_order) total_sales_order,sum(a.lama_waktu_pengerjaan_jam) hour_length,
     sum(a.lama_waktu_pengerjaan_menit) minute_length
	 ,sum(a.quantity) Quantity from (
     select concat(tu.first_name,' ',ifnull(tu.last_name,'')) picker,pl.start_time start_time,pl.end_time end_time,hour(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)) lama_waktu_pengerjaan_jam,
          minute(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)) lama_waktu_pengerjaan_menit,second(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)) lama_waktu_pengerjaan_detik,
          pli.sales_order,soi.qty quantity  from `tabPick List` pl inner join `tabPick List Item` pli on pl.name = pli.parent
             inner join `tabSales Order Item` soi on pli.sales_order = soi.parent
             left join `tabUser` tu on pl.picker = tu.email
          where pl.picker is not null and pli.sales_order is not null) a group by a.picker) b;
